pkgmetadata.longdescription: Backward Pipe (Right-to-Left) Operator // Provides a backward- pipe operator for 'magrittr' (%%) or 'pipeR' (%%) that allows for a performing operations from right-to-left. This allows writing more legible code where right-to-left ordering is natural. This is common with hierarchies and nested structures such as trees, directories or markup languages (e.g. HTML and XML). The package also includes a R-Studio add-in that can be bound to a keyboard shortcut.
